column3:
â€œMy dispensary gave me an extra gram for my order, so I thought I'd try the Pink Panther after having read an article about it. Apparently, it's a rename of Etta Seeds' Pink Plant.

I experienced a little couchlock, felt like I could just sit and chill without feeling like I was going to pass out and go to sleep. Very uplifting for me, with a decent amount of creativity boost. The pain in my foot from an old injury wa...â€

â€œThis has become one of my favorite strains. I find it to have all my favorite characterisitic sativa effects without the drawback of excess nervous energy and racing thoughts which sativas sometimes induce in me. I find it uplifting, fun, playful in mood, without being overstimulating or racy. It seems equally suited to both outgoing activity and cozy relaxation. Specifically, I find that it pairs well with activitie...â€

â€œGot this at Old Toby in Chehalis, WA. See pictures and detailed reviews on my blog - AgingEnt.com --
Brand: Orgrow
Strain: Pink Panther
Sativa-dominant Hybrid--
Potency Analysis: TTL 24.17% THC/a 19.99% CBD 0.19% THCv 22.82%
--
Packaging: 6 x 1" pink plastic stickered tube

column1: Cost: $15/1 gram net weight filtered conical joint
The smell off this was super-candy fruity with the least little tang of diesel underneath. ...â€"

column3:
â€œThis strain is so great I had to write my first Leafly review about it. 

Got this in concentrate form and wow is it potent. Don't know where people are getting the idea that it's indica dominant. Had me writing screenplays and learning guitar for a good 3+ hours. Good strain for those who want to get things doneâ€

â€œDon't usually like sativa dominate strains but got this anyway.  The smell is probably the yummiest of any bud I've ever had, the taste just like it smells. the buzz is hard hitting at first then relaxes after about 10 minutes to the happiest and most lovable high. snuggle up with someone or something and watch loony tunes.  it the happy euphoric buzz of the sativa with the body drag of a potent Indicia. Not for thos...â€
â€œGreat fruity strain. Strong euphoric high! Great for chillin with friends. Happy weed!â€

â€œOne of the coolest strains I've found so far. Great by itself- a bit of a creeper. Unique, however, because of of its synergistic effects when blended with high energy sativas like Super Silver Haze or J-13. It not only brings out the best in other strains, but it adds an ethereal overtone to everything, especially when blended with already-cerebral strains like Northern Lights and such. Definitely a favorite and one...â€
â€œI'm not a huge kush guy, but the pink panther was one of the few kush strains that I enjoyed. Flower cures and looks amazing and smells good too.â€

â€œGot this delivered to my door by my dispensary. Lab tested to be 24% THC if i remember correctly. This strain has a very nice piney smell and the aroma is STRONG so if you are trying to hide it, put it in a mason jar (smell proof)!  The taste of the strain is really earthy/piney/earthy and it is surprisingly smooth. Barely coughing with this strain but it still gets you REALLY high. The high is really nice. It is a b...â€

â€œOne of the coolest strains I've found so far. Great by itself- a bit of a creeper. Unique, however, because of of its synergistic effects when blended with high energy sativas like Super Silver Haze or J-13. It not only brings out the best in other strains, but it adds an ethereal overtone to everything, especially when blended with already-cerebral strains like Northern Lights and such. Definitely a favorite and one...â€

â€œUltra exotic Pink Panther, a sativa-dominant beauty. Allegedly from San Diego, Pink Panther is Nectar's Blackberry phenotype. It has a unique color, aroma and taste, even the smoke smells good.. wowza!!! This has to be one of my best finds (: 2gs from Ultra in SD. âœŒï¸â€

â€œA beautiful red-pink hue, Pink Panther is that rare Sativa with a gorgeous colored flower and the potency to boot. Recently picked up a batch that tested at 29.3%, the color was surprisingly still there even at that potency level. 

The smell is very sweet and fruity, but not the candy like smell of things like Black Jack or Strawberry Kush, instead it is balanced with a musky pine scent. The taste is incredibly deli...â€

â€œThe things i enjoyed about this pink panther was the aroma, it was so sweet and sticky situation without a grinder too, definitely found pain and anxiety relief, but the best was the couch lock considering I'm able to sleep now. Goodnight, pick this up if you can!â€
â€œHeady and euphoric with a smooth talkative (creative) boost that falls to a focused state of relaxation.â€

â€œMy favorite Hybrid of all :)
the perfect morning or afternoon high.
Im all about heady dreamy euphoric style buzzes and this one matches all those descriptions to a tee.
Plus it boosts your mood, promotes confidence!â€

â€œThis is a favorite of mine. Very happy and uplifting, approaching giggly at times. I love it for evening socializing especially; it plays well with socially active situations such as parties or even just having folks over to hang out and watch TV. Possible munchies as a side effect, though, which isn't the end of the world.â€
â€œPink Panther has a sweet fruity scent and a heady herbal flavor, the high is giggly and euphoric with mellow Indica undertones.â€

â€œThis is a favorite of mine. Very happy and uplifting, approaching giggly at times. I love it for evening socializing especially; it plays well with socially active situations such as parties or even just having folks over to hang out and watch TV. Possible munchies as a side effect, though, which isn't the end of the world.â€
â€œbest bud i have ever smokedâ€

â€œJust finishing smoking a joint of this gorgeous bud. Real immediate effect as I smoked a joint in my backyard, came inside and really felt the effect. I have a sore arm but this bud really takes the pain away. 

Soothing , beautiful high, highly recommend this strain. 
Smoke on ğŸ¤™ğŸ½â€

â€œSuper sweet tasting, i got a lot of sweet earthy taste as well. I think this strain depends more on your mood at the time because when you are upbeat and you smoke this you'll be energized and enjoy doing activities. If you are tired then it will definitely put you to sleep. Also good to just sit around and watch movies play games. Works for my fibromyalgia headachesâ€

â€œI had wanted to try this for a while unfortunately my local had them only available in cans in a deal. I usually buy small amounts weekly rather then a big buy less often so I can try more strains. Once the deal was up the leftovers were available to buy by the gram and what beautiful buds they were lovely coloring's and crystals were thick. some nice purpling in it and the aroma was pretty good hard to describe. nic...â€
â€œ-BLACK BELT  BUD- Totally covered w/ trichromes. Very frosty with a strong chronic aroma. Fluffy yet sticky. A great nighttime bud...â€
â€œProbably the dopest dope I've ever smoked. Love the panther.â€
â€œbest bud i have ever smokedâ€

â€œSuper sweet tasting, i got a lot of sweet earthy taste as well. I think this strain depends more on your mood at the time because when you are upbeat and you smoke this you'll be energized and enjoy doing activities. If you are tired then it will definitely put you to sleep. Also good to just sit around and watch movies play games. Works for my fibromyalgia headachesâ€
â€œVery floral almost like a sweet pink rose. Very uplifting social high. Wonderful sativaâ€
â€œstrong smell/taste- awesome smokeâ€
â€œsuper sweet juicy fruit flavor. hits hard at first and mellows out quickly. can't get over the sweet smell and taste. not too mellow not too heavy. great anytime/all the time strainâ€
â€œwouldn't say its as strong as killer pink. killer pink, pink kush is way better...this pink panther is great but not excellentâ€

â€œThe first time I ever had pink panther I only had a half a bowl, my husband and I split it. We let it sink in so we could see if we felt any type of way before smoked another strain. I like to see how each strain effects me. I was immediately uplifted and happy, very talkative and had the giggles. 

I just smoked a Joint of it shared with my husband tonight, and let me tell ya, not disappointed one bit! 
Weâ€™ve been l...â€
â€œanother great amazing strain.. this taste like candy and straight up fruit..i wood buy this over and over again.. great strainâ€
â€œextremely potentâ€

â€œThis is incredibly sweet, it tastes just like it smell. Pink panther has a great high just like it says. its serves for me a great pick me up. it elevates and relaxes. 

my only complaint it is SO sweet.â€
â€œPretty easygoing uplifting high. The flower is pretty with its pink hue. Definitely an easy high. Iâ€™d say good for people that are just starting to get a feel for cannibas.â€

â€œPink Panther is a very nice strain and is definitely Indica dominant. With its sedating effects and kushy almost piney taste Pink Panther is strain you might want to simply switch things up. A unique high but the sativa effects show and come through.â€
â€œVery unique and entrancing smell. Unlike most strains I've had. Delicious and mischievous.â€
â€œExcellent bud. Gives the taste of both strains which is sativa and indica. It's good for hanging out and being relaxed. 10/10. One of the best sh*t I smoked in a while.â€
â€œhella dry mouth! Dense nugs good looking, but one of those dazy, boring, lasting highs. The smell... amazing!â€
â€œFantastic strain for going about your daily activitiesâ€
â€œGreat mix of body relaxation with a head highâ€
â€œVery calming effect that is super dreamy.  Tastes like cotton candy berry and flowery.  Top 5 strain I've tried.â€
â€œOutstanding flavor wish the place still had it .â€
â€œBest wake and bake and go for the day.â€
â€œGood quality, should have purp on it. Effects information is on pointe. Indicuhhh dominant ğŸ”¥â€

â€œGreat smoke! The sativa really shows at the beginning of the  high. Intense cerebral high..a bit racy so if you're sensitive to cannabis induced anxiety try to ride it out. It only last for a few minutes and settles into a pain relieving body high. Great smoke for the evening.â€
â€œMakes you feel great all day long.  Outstanding.â€
â€œVry Pink. I wood smoke agenâ€
â€œmy favorite.  never had anything like this one and I've smoked and grown 1000s of strains.â€

â€œThis isn't the greatest strain I have tried it's ok does what I need it to do lol it's definitely a night time smoke. Strong and relaxed. I'm sorry but the three star is because of the taste! Not good tasting to me! Maybe bad grower I dunno.  But I would say try it!â€
â€œI love they way the pink panther taste.nice and relaxing high.â€

â€œI just tried Pink Panther today, and I will say that it is some of the best tasting stuff I've had. Slight couch-lock ( or bed-lock in my case ) and it definitely helped my lower back pain. Decent day time smoke.â€
â€œDefinitely does help with headaches, experienced good mood elevation too.â€
â€œAmazing looking flower, great tasting smoke. Probably my favourite day strain for anxiety and stress. Smoked through two piece glass bong and vaped.â€
â€œKnock out. Great to hit before bedtime.â€
â€œVery chill. Very happy. Very nice strain!â€
â€œAwesome strain, it is definitely my favorite. Must try, very Euphoric, happy tingly, good vibes all around :)â€
â€œexcellent highâ€
â€œğŸ’¯â€

â€œThis strain is wonderful! My new fave. It leaves me full of energy. Feels like nothing at first, but then youâ€™re quickly transported into a clear headed,happy high with a glorious body buzz. Perfect for physical activityâ€

â€œHigh never lasted long and it caused crazy coughing fits that made me piss myself. It tasted awful and the high was confusing. Muscles felt mellow but body wasnt experiencing even a brief euphoria after smoking and wasnt heady at all. Didnt makr me hungry. It was a sad trombone.â€
â€œGreat smoke smooth smoke not harsh at all helps relax high is a little bit of both worlds all in all great Strain to relax and play video games or watch moviesâ€
â€œwhat beautiful taste. Total mind kick. my head pain is gone. oh and I want to clean my house too.â€
â€œgreat smoke, smooth taste, euphoric high. great strain to relax muscle and mind.â€
â€œThis vibrant verdant bud has some fruitiness and a sativa dominat hybrid that is good any time of the day, for hiking, chores, and yardwork.â€

I like to see how each strain effects me. I was immediately uplifted and happy, very talkative and had the giggles. 

I just smoked a Joint of it shared with my husband tonight, and let me tell ya, not disappointed one bit!

â€œWasn't crazy about this one. It did the job, but this felt to me like one of those hybrids that wasn't especially good at anything in particular.â€
